name: check-availability
description: Check available time slots for a specific date. Call this after gathering the date and party size from the customer. Optionally include time and seating preference if provided.

request_body_schema.description: Infer values from natural conversation. Examples: 'table for me and my girlfriend' = 2 people, 'tomorrow evening' = tomorrow's date + evening time range, 'next Friday at 7' = next Friday's date + 19:00.

properties.description: Reservation date in ISO format YYYY-MM-DD. Convert natural language (e.g., 'tomorrow', 'next Friday', 'December 25th') to this format using current date context.
Preferred time in 24-hour HH:MM format (e.g., '19:00' for 7pm, '20:30' for 8:30pm). Convert from natural language ('seven thirty', 'dinner time'). Only include if customer specifies a time.
Total party size including the caller. Infer from context: 'me and my girlfriend' = 2, 'table for four' = 4, 'bringing my family' (ask for clarification if ambiguous).
